title: Laura Dern agrees to reduced child support payments from ex-husband Ben Harper
text:
Laura Dern has agreed to receive reduced child support payments from her ex-husband Ben Harper in light of their changed incomes over the last two years.

Harper, 49, was initially paying Dern $17,000 per month, but has now reduced his payments to $10,000, according to court documents obtained by The Blast.

Dern, 52, and Harper share son Ellery, 18, and daughter Jaya, 14, together, and were married from 2005 to 2013.

New agreement: Laura Dern has agreed to receive reduced child support payments from her ex-husband Ben Harper in light of their changed incomes over the last two years

Harper claims his income 'has substantially decreased' since their initial agreement was put in place in 2017, whereas Dern has experienced increased earnings.

The musician pays for his son Ellery's private school tuition, and for their two children's life and medical insurance.

Harper is an accomplished singer whose work includes the songs Both Sides Of The Gun, Lifeline, and What Lies For Dark Times.

A critically acclaimed musician, Harper has received three Grammy awards throughout his career, most recently in 2014 for Best Blues Album.

Music maker: Harper is an accomplished singer whose work includes the songs Both Sides Of The Gun, Lifeline, and What Lies For Dark Times (pictured 2019)

In addition to Ellery and Jaya, Harper has son Charles and daughter Harris from his first marriage to Joanna Harper.

He remarried in 2015 to Jaclyn Matfus.

Dern has not remarried but has continued to rise to prominence with her starring role in the hit HBO series, Big Little Lies.

Pride and joy: The actress was spotted with her daughter Jaya and son Ellery at LAX in 2017

The way they were: Dern and Harper, pictured in 2009, were married from 2005 to 2013 and had two children together

Since 2017, she has been playing Renata Klein on Big Little Lies, which follows the escapades of a group of women harboring a secret.

Aside from Big Little Lies, she will also reprise her role as Ellie Sattler in Jurassic World 3.

The action film is slated for a 2021 release.
